website_summaries.verdict: This plumping lip gloss offers great staying power and comes in three flattering nude shades that should suit most skin tones.
pros: Goes on smoothly with a nice consistency
Noticeable tingle that is stronger than most brands and produces visible plumping results
The gloss has a high sheen and flecks of shimmer that sparkle in sunlight
cons: A few people find the tingling sensation too powerful

customer_reviews.title: GOT THIS FOR MY LADY- "WOW"
customer_reviews.text: Great color, wet look, with a small touch of glitter lookin. This is fantastic, and it makes my ladies lips look fuller- she got a ton of compliments. I enjoyed every minute of it. This is a very good product. BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: edwardblakey

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and granddaughters absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me how much she and her daughter love this product, so I added this to a 16th birthday gift basket. I wasn't sure my granddaughter would even wear it, but she loves it and wears it every day and so does her 14 year old sister and their mom. It was a great part of a fun gift.
customer_reviews.author: UtahBee

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best plumper gloss. Not sure that it actually plumps but the color and staying power is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lovey

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, this is the most fantastic lip plumper, ever!!! Let's face it, most of these products have little effect if any at all. This one really works and the color is beautiful. I have already ordered 2 of this color and intend to order other colors. Just give a try and you will be hooked, too.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: No plumping magic for me but it's deifinetly my fav gloss
customer_reviews.text: I'm a lip picker and this gloss helps soothes the damage afterwards. It doesnt plump my lips at all (not that I need it) and the consistency isn't too greasy or thick. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jass

customer_reviews.title: but i do like the product
customer_reviews.text: overpriced for the teardrop [yet stated] sample size... the sample is so tiny that makes it difficult to apply. but i do like the product... does not look like the picture but then i like how it looks as better than the picture [for me]
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My lips are sensitive and I can't wear anything on them and feel comfortable. Except for this lipgloss! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Evo

customer_reviews.title: Broken tube and appears used
customer_reviews.text: This lipgloss came completely destroyed. I can’t imagine the seller didn’t realize since the broken pieces of the lipgloss are nowhere to be found. It doesn’t close and appears to have been USED. Absolutely disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Great color light tingle to be expected looks great on camera
customer_reviews.author: Carlee Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite gloss. Love the color and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have it in multiple shades. Love the tingly feeling on my lips :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rincon

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I waisted $15. This did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Trioswimcollection

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Well this actually works really good and it’s very pretty highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kalen Aguero

customer_reviews.title: This is the best lip plumper gloss ever!
customer_reviews.text: It feels tingely, like you can feel your lips get plumperfect
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Miltenberger

customer_reviews.title: Regret purchase and no return policy
customer_reviews.text: Smells and tastes bad. Lips dry shortly after application. Don’t see any plumping either!
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Great color, great plumping, feels & smells good too
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lip gloss. The plumping factor works really well and is not painful. The color is perfect and feels and smells great! I will certainly order another when this one runs low.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mason

customer_reviews.title: No better lip gloss out there
customer_reviews.text: Best lip gloss out and there and the color - Plumsup - is a favorite. I keep one in my purse for touchups as well as one I put on every morning when applying makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell
customer_reviews.text: This product smells so bad I can’t even wear it. I tried three times and had to wipe it off the smell was so bad. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Good But Does Not Stay on For Very Long
customer_reviews.text: It smells and feels tingly almost the entire time it is on. However, that does not last very long, only about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Undadac0203

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great, it’s super good at plumping but I felt like it was not super appealing smelling, it smelled like a weird chocolate
customer_reviews.author: Serena Beltramo

customer_reviews.title: Peeling
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 of these lip glosses, the plumping actually was uncomfortable and I’ve never had that experience before. Also it peeled my lips and made them chapped. The colors are nice but I don’t like my reaction to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Julissa Reynoso

product_meta.title: Soap And Glory Sexy Mother Pucker PLUMSUP Lip Plumping Gloss 7ml
product_meta.description: SEXY MOTHER PUCKER lip gloss is infused with a secret blend of natural plant oils that, when applied to the lips, create a buzzing and tingling sensation (it's fab, we promise), BUT more importantly these oils react to PLUMP-UP the lips
